chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
top_top_bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
A_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
A_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A_1 m k x -> A (B_1 m k x) k y = A m k y
A_1_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> x -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
A_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), y <> x -> A (B m k x) k y = A m k y
pred_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k x -> top m k x <> A_1 m k x
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
B_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B m k x = m
B_1_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B_1 m k x = m
bottom_top_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
cA_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k (top m k z) = bottom m k z
cA_1_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
cA_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> cA m k z = bottom m k z
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (top m k z) = z
top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = z
nopred_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k z = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
top_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> top m k (A_1 m k z) = top m k z
top_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (A m k z) = top m k z
top_top_2 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
bottom_A_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> bottom m k (A_1 m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_A : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> bottom m k (A m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_bottom_2 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> pred m k z -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z
A_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A (B m k x) j y = A m j y
A_1_B_1_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) j y = A_1 m j y
A_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A_1 (B m k x) j y = A_1 m j y
A_B_1_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x y : dart), k <> j -> A (B_1 m k x) j y = A m j y
not_exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> bottom m k z = nil
not_exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> top m k z = nil
top_top_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z
bottom_bottom_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ pred m k z -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z
bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> bottom m k (bottom m k z) = bottom m k z
top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> top m k (top m k z) = top m k z

``` 
intros m k x y H1 H2 H3 H4 H5.
unfold bottom, top.
destruct H1 as [H1 _].
destruct H2 as [H2 | H2].
- destruct H3 as [H3 | H3].
  + rewrite H5. reflexivity.
  + rewrite not_exd_bottom with m k y. 
    * reflexivity.
    * exact H1.
- rewrite not_exd_bottom with m k x.
  + reflexivity.
  + exact H1.
Qed. 
```

original: intros m k x y H1 H2 H3 H4 H5. unfold bottom, top. destruct H1 as [H1 _]. destruct H2 as [H2 | H2]. - destruct H3 as [H3 | H3]. + rewrite H5. reflexivity. + rewrite not_exd_bottom with m k y. * reflexivity. * apply H1. - rewrite not_exd_bottom with m k x. + reflexivity. + apply H1.
